articles.description: Led by the man himself, MS Dhoni, CSK, despite serving a two-year-ban, completed a triumphant return in 2018 by winning the crown, before narrowly missing out on what could have been a fourth trophy for the side.

articles.description: Ganguly, who was a top-order batsman in ODIs, came to bat at no.5 in Tests in most part of his career. In 113 Tests, Ganguly scored 7212 runs at a sublime average of 42.18, which is higher than his ODI avg 40.73.
